channel.title: Frost dragon help
channel.description: does anybody have the animation id of a frost dragon breathing fire? it would help a ton... thanks

item.title: Frost dragon help

[/quote]
Find it in your source -.-[/quote]

Yup gravedig but you pissed me off that much. Called hard coded LAWL asswipe

item.title: Frost dragon help
item.dc:creator: @collin123456 collin123456
item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

[quote=“Get Blitz, post:8, topic:406553”][quote author=Get Blitz link=topic=503554.msg3683891#msg3683891 date=1311725427]

Google.

i couldn’t find it on google, that’s why i asked here

WOW really I typed “Frost Dragon Animations” and i clicked the first link and got them…

ID: 51
Render ID: 1755
Walk Animation: 13156
Stand Animation: 13157
Attack Animation: 81
Fire Projectile: World.getWorld().getProjectileManager().fire(n.get Location(), p.getLocation(), 5
0, 100, 393, 46, 31, p);
[/quote]

Fire Projectile: World.getWorld().getProjectileManager().fire(n.get Location(), p.getLocation(), 50, 100, 393, 46, 31, p);[/quote]
thats the projectile…
not the animation the dragon does while breathing fire

Read full topic
